## Type

- [ ] Hadith reference / accuracy
- [ ] Quran verse / translation
- [ ] Transliteration
- [ ] Dua / supplication
- [ ] Other: ___

## Location

Where is this content in the app? (e.g., `src/data/checklistData.ts`, Wudu page, Ayat al-Kursi card)

## Issue Description

Describe the concern. Include the current text if relevant.

## Source / Reference

- **For Hadith:** Sunnah.com URL (e.g., https://sunnah.com/bukhari:6320)
- **For Quran:** Quran.com URL or API reference
- **For translation:** Which translation source (e.g., Saheeh International)

## Suggested Correction (if known)

If you have a verified correction, provide it here. AI agents can use the fact-check skill: `.cursor/skills/fact-check-sunnah-quran/`

## Priority

- [ ] Critical (incorrect attribution, wrong verse)
- [ ] High (meaning changed, weak hadith presented as strong)
- [ ] Medium (transliteration, style)
- [ ] Low (cosmetic, optional improvement)
